bsph.options.activation_mode.name: Activation Mode
bsph.options.activation_mode.tooltip: Changes the mode for activating the highlights. If set to `Toggle`, pressing the keybinds will toggle the highlights on/off. Highlights are reset when changing worlds. If set to `Hold`, keybinds must be held to highlight players.
bsph.options.show_glowing.name: Show Glowing
bsph.options.show_glowing.tooltip: Whether to increase the brightness of the outline color whenever a player has the regular glowing effect.
bsph.options.show_invisibility.name: Show Invisibility
bsph.options.show_invisibility.tooltip: Whether to decrease the brightness of the outline color whenever a player has the invisibility effect.
